name: DIY MAKE YOUR OWN BOUTIQUE TUTUS - PDF, TUTORIAL, EASY TO FOLLOW - WHOLESALE INFO
description:
★★★★★★★★★★★★★★★★
PDF TUTORIAL
★★★★★★★★★★★★★★★★

Make your own boutique style tutus with this step by step tutorial! This is a no-sew project!

This tutorial includes 6 chapters:

Chapter 1 – Introduction

Chapter 2 - Supplies & Cutting Technique

Chapter 3 - Getting Started

Chapter 4 - Making the Tutu

Chapter 5 - BONUS – Ideas

Chapter 6 - Thank You!

This PDF tutorial is complete with detailed photos, text, and clear instructions for simple tutu making. Even if you've never attempted a tutu before, you will be able to make one after following this tutorial.

Also included is a GREAT way to save time -- do not cut tulle the old fashioned way!! This technique has cut my time down from almost an hour to under 30 minutes!

This easy to follow pattern is a simple and perfect project for anyone! Girls who enjoy all things princess, glitzy, glam, girly, and ballerina will love these tutus!

The finished tutu is a great gift, and it is an ideal prop for photographers. I have received numerous compliments on each and every tutu I’ve made, and now you have the opportunity to create your own.

Sell your creations! That is what this PDF is designed for. It will help you make BOUTIQUE QUALITY TUTUS.

Upon payment, this item will be emailed to you within 24-48 hours (typically less than 12) via email in PDF form upon receipt of payment. Free shipping!

Please leave your email address in the note to seller checkout process.

★★★In your email you will also receive some wholesale information - where to buy crochet headbands, hair bows, other accessories to go with your tutus, AND where to buy TULLE at low prices!!★★★

Enjoy!
